author: rooneg
msg: repeat after me:  "i will run portlint before i commit a port"
remove a trailing slash that slipped in.

author: brane
msg: Added the --disable-neon-version-check parameter which causes any
version of neon to be considered correct for svn.
changes the allowed neon version to all if parameter present
changes the allowed neon version to all if parameter present

author: brane
msg: * trunk: Ignore directory db4-win32 instead of db3-win32.
* subversion/clients/win32/svn.ico: Change icon to something not so nice,

author: sussman
msg: Make the dump-editor write to an svn_stream_t instead of an apr_file_t.
* svn_io.h, io.c (svn_stream_printf): new helper function for streams.
* dump.c (struct edit_baton): remove unused rev and fs fields.  change
svn_stream_t instead of apr_file_t, and use svn_stream_printf
(dump_node): same as above, but also rewrite the text-dumping code.
* svn_repos.h (svn_repos_dump_fs): update prototype to take a stream.
* svnadmin/main.c (main): open a stream to stdout, pass it to dump_fs.

author: cmpilato
msg: This affects issue #656 (and continues the work in revisions #1851, 1886).
Continue the work of separating the internal filesystem structures from
the list/string skeleton library routines.  This is a requirement for
pluggable database backends, and will (I think) assist in the
conversion to the new NodeId interface.
and change the promise a bit.
with apr_hash_t's.  Life is better like that, trust me.
(svn_fs__parse_proplist_skel): Dup the keys from the skel.
(svn_fs__parse_node_revision_skel): Use counted dup for ancestor path.
(svn_fs__dag_rename): Remove dead code (you want it?  get it from
Update use of dag_node_t's new types for its kind and node_revision
elements, and the interfaces which formerly used skels and now do
node_rev_make_mutable): Upgrade to the new skel-free interface.
merge, txn_body_merge, txn_body_dir_entries): No more skels.
(svn_fs_dir_entries): Docstring for this doesn't mention the option
of returning a NULL hash, so we won't.
